mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QuestionView where classId = #{param5} and (${param2} like '%${param4}%' or ${param3} like '%${param4}%') order by regDate DESC limit ${(param1-1)*15}, 15
mapper.insert: insert into Question(no, title, content, writerId, classId) values ((select IFNULL(max(cast(no as unsigned)), 0)+1 from Question q), #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{classId})
mapper.update: update Question set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
update Question set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
